attributes.action: David Cameron MUST apologise to Mark Reckless for his 'fat arse' comment or RESIGN.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron proved just how disgusting and depraved a person he is by making that comment about someone held in much higher regard than he, by the people of this country.  If he has ANY shame he will now apologise and if he refuses to do so he MUST be forced to resign.  The people of this country deserve MUCH, MUCH better than what David Cameron has to offer them.  The feeling of shame this revealing comment has brought on the people of Witney, who elected him, MUST BE OVERPOWERING.
